metaTitle: Oasis Villas 2 La Finca | Luxury Golf Villas Algorfa from €395,000
metaDescription: Discover Oasis Villas 2 by Contrimar at La Finca Golf Resort. Luxury 3-bedroom villas with private pool, golf views, and premium finishes. Q1 2027 delivery.

content.heroIntro:
Welcome to Oasis Villas 2 at La Finca Golf Resort, the latest exclusive development from renowned builder Contrimar. Nestled within one of Costa Blanca South's most prestigious golf communities, these stunning 3-bedroom villas offer the perfect fusion of luxury living and an active golf lifestyle.

With delivery scheduled for Q1 2027, now is the ideal time to secure your slice of Mediterranean paradise. Each villa features generous living spaces, private swimming pools, and spectacular views across the championship La Finca Golf course. Contrimar's reputation for quality craftsmanship and attention to detail is evident throughout, making Oasis Villas 2 an exceptional choice for discerning buyers seeking the ultimate Spanish home.

locationSection.intro:
La Finca Golf Resort stands as one of Costa Blanca's premier residential golf destinations. Located in Algorfa, this beautifully landscaped community offers world-class golfing facilities, excellent amenities, and a vibrant international community. The resort's 18-hole championship course, designed by Pepe Gancedo, winds through stunning Mediterranean landscapes with strategic water features and challenging greens.

The location perfectly balances tranquil resort living with excellent accessibility. You're just 25 minutes from Alicante-Elche Airport, with beautiful beaches at Guardamar and Torrevieja within a 15-minute drive. The charming town of Algorfa provides daily essentials, while larger shopping and entertainment options are readily available in nearby Quesada and Torrevieja.
highlights: Frontline to La Finca Golf's championship 18-hole course
15 minutes to Guardamar and Torrevieja beaches
Walking distance to La Finca clubhouse, restaurant, and pro shop
Established international community with year-round residents
Close to La Zenia Boulevard shopping center
Excellent road connections via AP-7 motorway

propertyFeatures.intro: Each Oasis Villa 2 has been thoughtfully designed to maximize both indoor comfort and outdoor living, perfect for the Costa Blanca's enviable climate. Contrimar's signature quality is evident in every detail, from the contemporary architectural design to the premium fixtures and finishes throughout.
features: 2 fully-tiled modern bathrooms with quality sanitaryware
Open-plan living and dining area with high ceilings
Fully fitted designer kitchen with integrated appliances
Large private swimming pool with surrounding terrace
Covered and open terraces for outdoor dining
Solarium rooftop terrace with golf course views

content.investmentSection:
La Finca Golf Resort represents one of the most compelling investment opportunities in Costa Blanca South. Properties within the resort have consistently demonstrated strong capital appreciation, driven by limited availability and growing international demand for golf lifestyle properties.

The rental market for golf villas in this area is particularly robust, with La Finca properties commanding premium rates throughout the extended golf season (September to June). International golf tourists, particularly from the UK, Scandinavia, and Northern Europe, actively seek quality villa accommodation with golf course access. With professional management, owners can expect attractive rental yields while enjoying personal use during their preferred times.

Off-plan purchases like Oasis Villas 2 offer additional advantages: secure today's prices against market appreciation, customize finishes to your preferences, and benefit from phased payment schedules that make ownership more accessible.
whyBuySection: Built by Contrimar - established developer with 20+ years of quality construction
Prime frontline location to La Finca's championship golf course
Off-plan pricing with significant appreciation potential before completion
Private pool, solarium, and premium finishes included in price
Strong rental demand from golf tourists ensures investment returns
Part of an established, well-maintained resort community
Flexible payment plan with only 30% deposit required
Choice of plot positions still available - secure the best views

faqs.question: What is the price for Oasis Villas 2 at La Finca?
faqs.answer: Oasis Villas 2 are priced from approximately €395,000 depending on plot position and any customization options. Contact us for current availability and exact pricing for each remaining villa.

faqs.question: When will Oasis Villas 2 be completed?
faqs.answer: Delivery is scheduled for Q1 2027 (March 2027). Contrimar has an excellent track record for on-time delivery, and we'll keep you updated on construction progress throughout the build.

faqs.question: What payment schedule applies?
faqs.answer: Typical payment structure is 30% deposit on reservation, further staged payments during construction, and the final balance on completion. Exact schedules can be discussed based on your circumstances.

faqs.question: Can I play golf at La Finca as a villa owner?
faqs.answer: Yes! Villa owners at La Finca enjoy preferential green fees and membership options at the resort's championship course. The clubhouse is within walking distance of Oasis Villas 2.

faqs.question: Is La Finca a good rental investment?
faqs.answer: Excellent. Golf villas at La Finca achieve strong rental returns, particularly during the extended golf season from September to June. The established resort infrastructure, international reputation, and quality of properties ensure consistent demand.

faqs.question: What other golf courses are nearby?
faqs.answer: Within a 20-minute drive, you have access to Vistabella Golf, La Marquesa Golf, Las Colinas Golf, Villamartín Golf, and Lo Romero Golf. This concentration of quality courses makes the area exceptionally attractive to golf enthusiasts.

faqs.question: Who is the builder Contrimar?
faqs.answer: Contrimar is one of Costa Blanca's most respected developers, with over 20 years of experience building quality homes in the region. They're known for excellent build quality, reliable delivery, and strong after-sales support. View their other developments on our builders page.

faqs.question: Can I customize my villa?
faqs.answer: Yes, off-plan purchases typically allow for customization of interior finishes, tiles, kitchen options, and sometimes layout modifications. Early purchasers have the most flexibility. Contact us to discuss available options.

faqs.question: What are the annual running costs?
faqs.answer: Budget approximately €3,000-4,000 annually for IBI (property tax), community fees, insurance, and basic maintenance. This excludes utilities which depend on usage. We can provide detailed cost breakdowns.

faqs.question: Can you help arrange financing?
faqs.answer: Yes! We work with Habeno, specialists in Spanish mortgages for international buyers. They can arrange up to 70% financing for non-residents with competitive rates. Contact us for an introduction and personalized mortgage consultation.

content.conclusion: Oasis Villas 2 at La Finca Golf represents a rare opportunity to own a luxury villa in one of Costa Blanca's most prestigious golf communities. With Contrimar's proven quality, an unbeatable location, and strong investment fundamentals, this development ticks every box for buyers seeking the ultimate golf lifestyle. Limited villas remain - contact us today to secure your preferred plot position and begin your La Finca journey.

golfCourse.name: La Finca Golf Resort
golfCourse.description: La Finca Golf is an 18-hole, par 72 championship course designed by Pepe Gancedo. Known for its challenging layout with strategic water hazards and well-protected greens, it offers an excellent test for golfers of all abilities.
